articles.summary: MPs from Biju Janata Dal (BJD), Bharatiya Rashtra Samithi (BRS), Shiromani Akali Dal (SAD) and Independents among 13 lawmakers who abstained from the election

articles.title: 'Time Will Answer': Shivakumar Says Congress High Command To Decide On Karnataka Leadership Change
articles.summary: A faction of MLAs backing Shivakumar has been pushing for him to take over as chief minister since the 2023 Assembly election

articles.title: President Murmu To Administer Oath Of Office To Vice President On Sept 12
articles.summary: The voting will begin at 10 AM, and members of both Houses of Parliament are eligible to cast a vote till 5 PM. The counting of votes will begin shortly after voting ends

articles.title: Vice President Polls: BJP-Led NDA Leaves No Loose Ends, INDIA Bloc Fights Ideological Battle
articles.summary: While Radhakrishnan is a BJP veteran from Tamil Nadu and Maharashtra Governor, Reddy is a former Supreme Court judge who hails from Telangana and is known for key judgements

articles.title: ‘No Application Received’: TRAI Refutes Congress’ Claim Of Blocking Bid To Send 'Poll Fraud' SMS
articles.summary: TRAI denied Congress claims of blocking election SMS, saying no application was received and rejection was by service provider STPL, not TRAI or EC.

articles.title: 'VVIP Protocol In Floods': BJP Attacks Congress MP After Piggyback Video Goes Viral
articles.summary: Tariq Anwar, who represents Katihar in Parliament, was on a two-day visit to his constituency to review flood damage and meet affected residents.

articles.title: AAP, BJP Spar Over Rekha Gupta's Husband Attending Govt Meeting: 'Nothing Wrong'
articles.summary: The AAP slammed the ruling BJP party over CM Rekha Gupta's husband attending an official Delhi government meeting in Shalimar Bagh, calling it "unconstitutional".

articles.title: This Week in Explainers: How BJP wrested power from AAP in Delhi
articles.summary: The BJP is returning to power in Delhi after nearly three decades with a decisive mandate. The AAP’s loss was compounded by the defeat of its top leaders including chief Arvind Kejriwal. But what worked for the saffron party this time? We answer this and more in our weekly wrap from India

articles.title: Mahayuti’s ‘Maha’ dilemma: What are the chances of Devendra Fadnavis becoming CM?
articles.summary: Maharashtra has delivered a clear mandate for the Mahayuti, with the alliance grabbing 230 of the 288 Assembly seats. Now, the BJP-led grouping has to decide its CM pick. Will the saffron party choose Devendra Fadnavis, the frontrunner, or follow ‘coalition dharma’ and continue with Eknath Shinde?

articles.title: What next for Uddhav Thackeray after Maharashtra setback?
articles.summary: Uddhav Thackeray's Shiv Sena (UBT) suffered a crushing defeat in the Maharashtra Assembly polls, winning just 20 of 94 contested seats compared to Eknath Shinde’s faction, which secured 57 of 85. The results have raised questions about Thackeray’s ability to retain his party’s cadre and his claim to Bal Thackeray’s legacy

articles.title: 12 Maharashtra MLAs who make anti-incumbency look like a joke
articles.summary: Peasants and Workers Party of India's leader late Ganpatrao Deshmukh tops this list as he has won from the seat of Sangola 11 times straight, making him the longest-serving MLA in Maharashtra's history

articles.title: UP BJP Chief Bhupendra Chaudhary offers to resign: Is Uttar Pradesh cabinet staring at a rejig?
articles.summary: The saffron party secured 36 seats in Uttar Pradesh as compared to the INDIA bloc's 43. A reshuffle within the state party lines has been in buzz for quite some time with senior leaders from Uttar Pradesh holding key meetings with the party's top brass

articles.title: Who is B Sudershan Reddy? INDIA bloc candidate loses Vice-Presidential election to NDA's CP Radhakrishnan
articles.summary: Radhakrishnan, the current Governor of Maharashtra, emerged victorious with a big margin and will take over the role of V-P after his predecessor Jagdeep Dhankhar's resignation in July. The INDIA bloc had fielded retired Supreme Court judge B Sudershan Reddy in the contest against Radhakrishnan.

articles.title: Who is CP Radhakrishnan? NDA candidate wins Vice-Presidential election to become India's 15th V-P
articles.summary: Over 98 percent Members of Parliament (MPs) cast their votes to elect India's new V-P and counting of polls had started at 6 pm. Twelve out of 781 total MPs abstained from voting. Read on to know more.

articles.title: Mumbai: Metro Line 11 gets government approval; check route, completion, other details
articles.summary: Mumbai will get another Metro line soon, as the Maharashtra government on September 3 sanctioned its Line 11, to connect Wadala to South Mumbai or Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus and Gateway of India.

articles.title: Vice President Election: Akali Dal abstains after BRS and BJD; how will it impact Sudarshan Reddy vs CP Radhakrishnan race?
articles.summary: Ahead of the election, the Biju Janata Dal (BJD), Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) and Shiromani Akali Dal (SAD) have decided to abstain from the Vice Presidential elections, bringing a different to poll arithmetic. Know how it affects the Vice Presidential election?

articles.title: '8 lakh youth get jobs': UP CM Yogi Adityanath hails selection process in state, calls it 'fair, transparent'
articles.summary: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Sunday said that eight lakh youth have been given government jobs in the last eight years through a fair and transparent recruitment process while distributing appointment letters to newly selected candidates by UPPSC.

articles.title: Will India lift ban on TikTok? IT minister Ashwini Vaishnaw says, 'There is...'
articles.summary: TikTok will not be coming to India anytime soon, confirmed the government, ruling out all possibilities of the social media app. Union IT, Information and Broadcasting, and Railways Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw has dispelled all rumours that have been circulating for sometime.

articles.title: CBIC Chief Tells Tax Officers to Handhold Trade and Industry for Smooth Navigation of GST Rates
articles.summary: In the new rate slabs (5 & 18 per cent), the government has approved the reduced GST rates on 375 items, with a special rate of 40 per cent on tobacco and related products and ultra-luxury items, which are slated to be effective from September 22

articles.title: Big trouble for Xiaomi as Apple, Samsung slap legal notice against Chinese smartphone maker due to...
